219866.「バトルトリニティは ３つの勢力で 得点を競い\n いちばん 多くの得点を 稼い:
In Battle Trinity, three groups from different
clubs do battle to compete for points. The
club with the most points will win.
<bw_break>

219868.「得点を稼ぐには ジュエルという宝石を集めて\n 古戦場に ７つある トライロッ:
To earn points, you must collect the Jewels
scattered around the battlefield, and deposit
them into the large crystals called Trirocks.
<bw_break>

219870.「ジュエルには いろんな種類があって\n めずらしい色や形だと 高い得点になるん:
There are many types of Jewels to collect.
The larger and more unique-shaped ones are
worth more points.
<bw_break>

219872.「中には 試合後に 報酬が手に入る\n ボーナスジュエル なんてものもあるぞい。:
There's even one called a Bonus Jewel, which
will earn you rewards after the battle is
over. Be sure to pick them up!
<bw_break>

219874.「ただし せっかく手に入れた ジュエルも\n トライロックに納めなければ 得点に:
However, Jewels you pick up must be placed
in a Trirock you control. Otherwise, you won't
get any points.
<bw_break>

219876.「トライロックは 古戦場に ７つある。\n ジュエルを納めるには チームの拠点と:
There are seven Trirocks total. Your club must
control a Trirock in order to deposit any
Jewels into it.
<bw_break>

219878.「占領するには 一定時間 トライロックのそばで\n 待っているだけでよい。占領し:
To capture a Trirock, all you need to do is
stand close to it for a short while. After
that, you can deposit Jewels into it.
<bw_break>

219880.「占領したトライロックは 守っていないと\n 敵に奪われたりするぞ。試合後に 占:
Trirocks can be taken by opposing clubs if you do not defend them. You will earn points at the end of the game based on the number
of Trirocks you control, so it's very important to protect them.

219882.「他のクラブよりも たくさんのジュエルを集め\n 多くのトライロックを占領して:
Collecting and depositing more Jewels as well
as controlling more Trirocks than your
opponents is the key to victory.
<bw_break>

219884.「それと 古戦場では ジュエルとは別の\n 特別な玉が 見つかることがあるんじゃ:
In addition to Jewels, you may find special
orbs. Allow me to explain what they are.
<bw_break>

219886.「まずは お助けモンスターを呼ぶ 援軍玉じゃ。\n 使用すると モンスターがあら:
The first is called a Reinforcement Orb. This
will call in a monster that will help your
club when you use it.
<bw_break>

219888.「次は ジュエル得点がふえる 撃破玉。\n 相手を倒すと １つもらえ 個数に応じ:
Next is called an Attack Orb. This increases
the amount of Jewel Points you'll earn when
depositing your Jewels.
<bw_break>

219890.「これらの玉を うまく使いこなせれば\n より勝利に近づくじゃろう。くわしい内容:
Be sure to use these orbs well, as doing so
can lead to victory. If you'd like to know
more about them, choose "Explanation".
<bw_break>

219892.「最後に 職業についてじゃな。\n バトルトリニティでは 競技用となる\n ４つ:
Lastly, there are four different vocations to
choose from in Battle Trinity.
<bw_break>

219894.「戦士は 高いＨＰと 防御力をそなえた\n クラブの盾役じゃ。占領したトライロッ:
Warriors are your shields, with high HP and
defensive abilities. They excel at protecting
controlled Trirocks and their companions.
<bw_break>

219896.「魔法使いは うたれ弱いが 強力な範囲魔法で\n 相手を 一掃することができるん:
Mages are frail, but can easily defeat their
opponents with their powerful magic. Be
sure to keep ample eyes on your surroundings.
<bw_break>

219898.「武闘家は すばやい連撃と 範囲攻撃をもち\n めいそうで 自分を回復できる万能:
Martial Artists are versatile fighters, having a quick multi-hitting attack, a wide-range attack, and the ability to heal themselves.
You can expect them to do well in most situations.

219900.「盗賊は 戦闘は苦手じゃが 素早さがウリじゃ。\n 戦いを避け たくさんジュエル:
Thieves are not great in combat, but they are very quick on their feet. They can avoid fighting with ease and contribute to
victory by collecting many Jewels.

219902.「今 話した ４つの職業以外にも\n 時が経てば 新たな職業が 増えたりするぞい:
In addition to the four vocations I've just
discussed, more will be added as time goes
on. I hope you'll give them all a try.
<bw_break>

220122.「真夜中プリズランでは 追跡チームと逃走チーム\n どちらにも 専用の見た目に扮:
Midnight Jailrun will have both pursuit and escape teams dressed up in their own special look and feel. This time, I've prepared
costumes for the exorcist and the ghost, respectively, to match the atmosphere here in Wind Town Azlan. They are my masterpieces! But
whichever team you choose to play with, I'll be the one to decide who gets to play in which team.

220124.「追跡チームは 制限時間内に\n 逃走チームの５人 全員を\n 捕まえることがで:
If the Trackers can catch all five members
of the Escapees before time runs out, they
win.
<bw_break>

220126.「捕まえ方は カンタン。\n 相手に近づいて <convenience>を押すと:
So how do you catch them, exactly? It's easy! You can throw a hand forward by pressing !
However, you have a limited amount of hands you can use. Once they run out, you'll have to wait a bit for them to recover.
The Trackers can use a special dash by pressing . Use it sparingly, as you can't use it in quick succession.

220128.「逃走チームは 制限時間まで\n ひとりでも逃げのびたら 勝ちよ。\n<br>\:
The Escapees have until the time limit to escape. If even just one person remains uncaught, they win.
The Escapees have a special skill they can use with . It'll turn you invisible, but you can only use it every so often.

220130.「画面が黄色くなったら 追跡チームが\n 近づいてきている サイン。赤くなったら:
When the screen turns yellow, a Tracker
is getting close. When it's red, they're
REALLY close. Get away, quickly!
<bw_break>

220132.「追跡チームに 捕まった場合は\n プリズンエリアに 閉じ込められてしまうわ。\:
If a Tracker catches you, you'll be
locked inside the Prison Area.
<bw_break>

220134.「でも 安心して。プリズンロックに\n アタックすることで 捕まった仲間を\n:
But don't worry! By attacking the Prison Lock, you can save your allies who have been captured.
Attacking it is easy. Just go up to the Prison Lock and press .

220136.「ただし プリズンロックは 頑丈で\n ５回 アタックしないと\n 破壊すること:
However, the Prison Lock is really tough, so it'll take five attacks to destroy it.
On the fifth attack, the lock breaks and all of your captured allies will be rescued.

220138.「最後に アイテムについて 説明するわね。\n 真夜中プリズランには 遊びを盛り:
Lastly, let's talk about Items, which are the
various items that make Midnight Jailrun so
much fun.
<bw_break>

220140.「プリズンキーは 逃走チームが触れた瞬間に\n プリズンロックの ロックを １つ:
The Prison Key can destroy a lock on the Prison Lock the moment it is touched by the escape team! The Prison Key can be erased when
the pursuit team touches it. Both teams should take it as soon as they find it.

220142.「ほかにも キャッチハンドや\n お助けボックス ワープウィングなどの\n アイ:
There are other items, such as Catch Hands, Help Boxes, Warp Wings, and more.
Items mostly will automatically use themselves when picked up, but Helper Boxes and Insight must be used by holding down .
If you want to know more about the other items, I can explain them to you later. Just ask.

220144.「プリズランの手引きは 以上よ。\n 今すぐ 遊びたくて\n ウズウズしてきたん:
And that's all for how to play. I bet you're just itching to play now, aren't you?
Come on! Look deep inside and awaken those instincts!

237216.「タマゴの形をした チカラのかけらを調べると\n ５つのうち どれか１つ 手に入:
Red Egg 2 is Ogreed ContinentBlue Egg 2 is Wena IslandsGreen Egg 2 is Eltona Continent...Yellow Egg 2 is Dwachakka
Continent... Red Egg 2 is Dwachakka ContinentPurple Egg 2 is Pukuland Continent...Yellow Egg 2 is Dwachakka
Continent You can usually find them on all continents in the places where sparkles are usually found. Please note that you will not
be able to get the sparkles for a while after you get off the Dolboard at the place where you received the piece of power!

241631.「今 エントリー手続き中だ。\n 手続きが完了するまでに レースの\n ルールに:
Race entry is now in progress. I'll explain
the racing rules while we wait for it to
finish.
<bw_break>

241633.「ドルボードレースが 始まると\n 経過時間と あんたの記録した\n ベストタイ:
When the Dolboard Race starts, you'll see your elapsed time and best time on screen.
If your elapsed time exceeds 10 minutes, you'll automatically be disqualified. Try to reach the goal before that happens.

241635.「道中には『ハザード』という障害物があって\n それに触れると 速度が遅くなるか:
There're obstacles along the course called
"hazards" that'll slow you down if you touch
'em. Try to avoid 'em as best you can.
<bw_break>

241637.「モンスターも いるから\n それらも うまくかわしながら進むんだ。<br>\n:
Make sure to dodge any monsters wandering around so you don't waste time.
You should also use the charge boost function on your Dolboard as much as possible to get a good time.
If your Dolboard doesn't have that yet, go see Menme in Gatara. She'll set you up.

241639.「もうひとつ このコースには\n チャージブースト機能を 持っている人向けに\n:
There's one more thing to remember about the race for those who have the charge boost. It's called "Full Charge".
If you touch one while your charge meter is still filling, it will immediately fill up to the maximum.
Also, if you touch one while boosting, your charge meter will immediately fill back up to maximum once you finish boosting.
However, Full Charge won't do anything if your charge meter is already full when touching it.
The trick is to Full Charge when your meter is filling or you are boosting. This is super important.

241641.「最後に このコースについてだね。\n ここからスタートした後\n まずは カル:
Finally, I wanna talk about the course itself.
You'll start from here, and head towards
Chaldea Mountain Road.
<bw_break>

241643.「カルデア山道からは ガタラ原野への道前の\n チェックポイントを通って\n ガ:
From there, pass through the checkpoint near
the road to Gatara Fields.
<bw_break>

241645.「ガタラ原野からは 南に向かって\n モガリム街道を 目指すんだ。\n<bw_b:
From the Gatara Fields, head south toward
Mogarim Highway.
<bw_break>

241647.「そして このコースのゴール地点は\n モガリム街道の モガレキャンプだよ。<b:
The goal is right in front of the entrance to the Mogare Camp on Mogarim Highway.
After entering, your destination'll appear on your map. Do your best and shoot for the best time!

249158.「万魔の塔では 『災壇』と呼ばれる\n 戦場に 挑んでもらうぜ。\n<br>\n:
Inside Banma Tower are battlefields called platforms.
When ya make your way to one of those platforms, monsters'll come from all sides and swarm the place!
You'll wanna beat as many as you can to rack up tons of points! This is how things work here in Banma Tower!

249159.「さて 万魔の塔の戦いにおいて\n 俺が勝ちだと認める 勝利条件を\n ３つ教え:
So you're probably wondering how you can win inside Banma Tower. Well, there are three different ways, so I'll tell ya.
The first way to win is simple: beat all the waves of enemies that come at you!
I call this a "complete victory". But you'll have to be pretty darn good to do something like that. Hee hee hee!
The second way is surviving until the time limit runs out.
With that I COULD say you were victorious... But it's easier said than done.
The last way is going to the evacuation area called the Realm of Repose.
It's just a relief measure, ya know? If it were too hard, nobody'd bother to try. That'd be a big problem!
And I know you already know this, but if everyone in your party is wiped out, you fail the challenge.

249160.「ピンポンパンポーン～。\n ここで お前に 朗報だ。\n<br>\n「戦闘が:
Bing bong breadPawn~. Here's some good news for you. After a certain amount of time has passed since the battle began, you will be
allowed to enter the Realm of Repose, and the battle will end as soon as anyone other than your support companion enters the Realm of
Repose. Hmm? What happens to the score you earned until then? I'll record your score and mark you as having "returned" from the altar
of woe. Oh, how merciful of me...

249161.「あとな スコア １０００ポイント ごとに\n ギラムソウル 1こを 渡してやる:
One more thing! For every 1000 points you score, I'll give ya one Gilam Soul!
You can exchange 'em for items, and even give yourself some buffs with some of my Gilam Magic that I'll cast on you!
There's also rankings, if you're interested. Check out that tablet behind me if ya wanna see more.
And that's all for the rules. If you've got any questions or need help, you can ask me again and I'll explain it to ya.
Hm? What's this now? You've got quite the solid and composed lookin' face there.
Aren't you reaaaally really scared deep down? After all, you ARE standing at the entrance to a hell full of monsters... Hee hee hee...

249502.「真夜中プリズランでは 追跡チームと逃走チーム\n どちらにも 専用の見た目に扮:
Midnight Jailrun is a game where both pursuit and escape teams dress up in their own special look and play chase. This time, I've prepared
a wolf and a piglet costume to match the atmosphere here in Pukulet Village. They are my creations! But whichever team you choose to
play with, I'll decide how to divide the teams.

249503.「追跡チームは 制限時間内に\n 逃走チームの５人 全員を\n 捕まえることがで:
If the Trackers can catch all five members
of the Escapees before time runs out, they
win.
<bw_break>

249504.「捕まえ方は カンタン。\n 相手に近づいて <convenience>を押すと:
So how do you catch them, exactly? It's easy! You can throw a hand forward by pressing !
However, you have a limited amount of hands you can use. Once they run out, you'll have to wait a bit for them to recover.
The Trackers can use a special dash by pressing . Use it sparingly, as you can't use it in quick succession.

249505.「逃走チームは 制限時間まで\n ひとりでも逃げのびたら 勝ちよ。\n<br>\:
The escape team wins if even one person manages to escape before the time limit. The escape team will be given a special skill There is a smaller version that can be used with You cannot use it continuously. The "Become Smaller" not only makes you smaller,
but also increases your movement speed for a certain period of time. If you feel you are in danger, do not hesitate to use it!

249506.「画面が黄色くなったら 追跡チームが\n 近づいてきている サイン。赤くなったら:
When the screen turns yellow, a Tracker
is getting close. When it's red, they're
REALLY close. Get away, quickly!
<bw_break>

249507.「追跡チームに 捕まった場合は\n プリズンエリアに 閉じ込められてしまうわ。\:
If a Tracker catches you, you'll be
locked inside the Prison Area.
<bw_break>

249508.「でも 安心して。プリズンロックに\n アタックすることで 捕まった仲間を\n:
But don't worry! By attacking the Prison Lock, you can save your allies who have been captured.
Attacking it is easy. Just go up to the Prison Lock and press .

249509.「ただし プリズンロックは 頑丈で\n 何回か アタックしないと\n 破壊するこ:
However, the Prison Lock is really tough, so it'll take several attacks to destroy it.
By attacking as many times as there are locks at the top of the screen, the lock breaks and all of your captured allies will be rescued.

249510.「最後に アイテムについて 説明するわね。\n 真夜中プリズランには 遊びを盛り:
Lastly, let's talk about Items, which are the
various items that make Midnight Jailrun so
much fun.
<bw_break>

249511.「プリズンキーは 逃走チームが触れた瞬間に\n プリズンロックの ロックを １つ:
The Prison Key can destroy a lock on the Prison Lock the moment it is touched by the escape team! Note that the Prison Key cannot
destroy the last lock, but it can be erased when the pursuit team touches it. Both teams should take it as soon as they find it.

249512.「ほかにも キャッチハンドや\n お助けボックス ワープウィングなどの\n アイ:
There are other items such as the Catching Hand, the Help Box, the Warp Wing, etc. Items can be used the moment you touch them, but
only the Item in the Help Box can be used. Press and hold to use it. If you want to know more about other items, select "Explanation" later. I will tell you more about them.

249513.「プリズランの手引きは 以上よ。\n 今すぐ 遊びたくて\n ウズウズしてきたん:
And that's all for how to play. I bet you're just itching to play now, aren't you?
Come on! Look deep inside and awaken those instincts!

254712.「もしものときの話なのだが\n ガテリア号が 再び故障してしまったら\n 乗組員:
In the event that the Gateria breaks down
again, I'd like the entire crew to work
together to repair it.
<bw_break>

254713.「ガテリア号の 修理に必要なパーツは\n ねじ 電池 歯車の 三種類。\n<bw:
The parts that you'll need to collect to
repair the ship are screws, batteries, and
gears.
<bw_break>

254714.「修理が始まると まず\n 集めるパーツの担当がきまるぞ。\n<bw_break:
Once the repairs begin, it'll be up to you to
start collecting those parts.
<bw_break>

254715.「自分がどのパーツの 担当なのかは\n 頭上のアイコンで 確認できる。\n 担当:
The part icon above your head shows which part
you're responsible for finding. You won't be
able to pick up the other types.
<bw_break>

254716.「パーツをひろったら 収納ゾーンへ \n 納品してほしい。\n<br>\n「収納:
Once you've picked up your parts, I want you to take them to the storage zones.
There is a designated storage zone for each of the three types of parts.

254717.「制限時間内に 必要なパーツ数を集められないと\n 修理は 失敗してしまうのだ！:
If you don't collect the required number of
parts within the time limit, the repair will
fail! Work together and get those parts ASAP!
<bw_break>

254718.「パーツをひろうと エナジーが減りはじめる。\n ゼロになると ダイバースーツが:
As you pick up parts, your diver suit will
lose energy. When it hits zero, you'll be
unable to move until it recharges.
<bw_break>

254719.「だが 動けなくなっても あせるな！\n エナジーは 仲間にエールをしてもらうと:
But don't panic! If you see someone stuck, you can give them an energy boost to get them moving again.
It's a very powerful skill! You can use it as many times as you like, so don't hesitate to use it often!
However, you can't use it on yourself, and you can't use it if you're carrying parts. Be careful.

254720.「さらに 強力なスキルもあるぞ。\n その名は スタンゾーン！\n<br>\n「:
You also have another powerful skill at your disposal: Stun Zone!
This creates a powerful electrical current around you to ward off those dangerous creatures.

254721.「スタンゾーンは 海底でスタン弾を \n ひろえば 使用可能だ。\n スタン弾:
You'll need to use the Stun Shells scattered
around the ocean floor to use Stun Zone. It
takes one shell per use.
<bw_break>

254722.「乗組員の中には どのパーツも\n 担当しない者がいる。白いスーツの 乗組員は:
There are some crew members not in charge of any parts. Their diving suits will be colored white.
Instead, they run faster than normal, and use Cheer to give energy to those who need it.
They can also use Cheer on a fallen crewmate who's been bitten by an Abyssal Shark! This will allow them to move again immediately!

254723.「おさらいする。まずは 船体の修理に必要な\n パーツを集める。それが完了したら:
I'll review your task. First, we need to
gather the parts for the hull. Next, we'll
need parts for the engine!
<bw_break>

254724.「船体とエンジンの 修理が完了したら \n ガテリア号は もう大丈夫。\n 最後:
After both of those are repaired, the Gateria will be in ship shape. The last thing is to grab as much treasure as you can!
You can bring the treasure to either a storage zone or the ship itself. It's up to you!

254725.「ガテリア号の ハシゴから戻ることができるが\n お宝に目がくらんで 出発までに:
You can get back onto the Gateria by using the
ladder. Don't take too much time with the
treasure though, you could miss the trip back!
<bw_break>

254726.「それでは 諸君らの\n 健闘を祈っている！\n<bw_break>:
And with that, I wish you all the best of
luck!
<bw_break>

258873.「今 エントリー手続き中だよー。\n 手続きが完了するまでに レースの\n ルー:
Race entry is now in progress. I'll explain
the racing rules while we wait for it to
finish.
<bw_break>

258874.「ドルボードレースが 始まると\n 経過時間と あなたの記録した\n ベストタイ:
When the Dolboard Race starts, you'll see your elapsed time and best time on screen.
If your elapsed time exceeds 10 minutes, you'll automatically be disqualified. Try to reach the goal before that happens.

258886.「もうひとつ このコースには\n チャージブースト機能を 持っている人向けに\n:
There's one more thing to remember about the race for those who have the charge boost. It's called "Full Charge".
If you touch one while your charge meter is still filling, it will immediately fill up to the maximum.
Also, if you touch one while boosting, your charge meter will immediately fill back up to maximum once you finish boosting.
However, Full Charge won't do anything if your charge meter is already full when touching it.
The trick is to Full Charge when your meter is filling or you are boosting. This is super important.

<bw_break>

260302.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\nカードを４枚以上 同時に出すと\n:
If four or more cards are played at the same time, a Revolt occurs and card strength is reversed.
If another Revolt occurs during Revolt, card strength will return to normal.

260303.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\nスペードのカードが 場に出た枚数分:
For every Spade card that is played, a slime will appear on the board. When 8 appear, a Revolt occurs and card strength reverses.
If a Slime Revolt doesn't occur, any slimes on the board will be carried over into the next game.
If you play a Spade as a foul or at the end of the current game, a slime will not appear.

260304.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n大富豪以外のプレイヤーが 大富豪に:
When a non-Tycoon player becomes the Tycoon, the current Tycoon player loses.
When this happens, the losing player discards all of their cards and automatically becomes a Beggar.

260305.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\nあがりの時に 特定のカードを含めて:
If you play the designated card as the last card in your hand, you automatically lose.
The cards eligible for a Foul Play are a 2 or a Joker.
However, when strength is reversed from a Revolt or 11 Back, the Foul Play 2 card switches to 3.
When 8 Enders is active, 8 becomes a Foul Play card, and if 3 Spade Reverse is active, 3 of Spades becomes a Foul Play card.

260306.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n同じスートで 連続した数字のカード:
You can play three or more cards of the same suit with consecutive numbers at the same time.
The next cards played can be a chain that begins with a number that's higher than the lowest number in the board's current chain.
For example, if there is currently a chain of 3, 4, and 5 on the board, you may play a chain of 4, 5, 6 (or higher) on top of it.

260307.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n場に出されたカードに対して 連続し:
If you play card(s) in consecutive numbers on cards currently in play, players must play consecutive numbers until the board clears.
When both "Hold Over" and "Tight" occur, "Restrict" occurs, where both suit and number must match and be consecutive, respectively.

260308.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n場に出されたカードと 同じスートで:
If you play card(s) of the same suit on cards currently in play, players must play the same suit until the board clears.
For example, when the "Tight" suit is Hearts, the next card(s) played must also be Hearts.
When both "Hold Over" and "Tight" occur, "Restrict" occurs, where both suit and number must match and be consecutive, respectively.

260309.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n順番がまわってきたときに 時々\n:
On your turn, a discarded card may appear that you can exchange for one of the cards in your hand.
You may also choose to pass without exchanging any cards.
If there are no cards in the discard pile, Friend Card will not occur.

260310.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\nジョーカーを２枚入れて ゲームを始:
The game begins with 2 Jokers. If this rule is not in effect, there will only be 1 Joker.
The Joker cannot be played as a stronger card versus another Joker.

260311.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\nジョーカー１枚に対して\nスペード:
You may play a 3 of Spades on a Joker. When a 3 Spade Reverse occurs, the board clears.
If Foul Play is in effect, any player who plays a 3 of Spades as their final card automatically loses.

260312.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n５を出した枚数分の プレイヤーのタ:
For each 5 card played, the other players' turns will be skipped that many times. Your turns are not counted when this occurs.
When a Joker is played together with a 5, the Joker is not counted as a 5 when skipping turns.

260313.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n７を出した枚数を 上限として\n手:
You may pass a number of cards to the next player, up to the number of 7 cards you played.
You can also choose to not pass any cards from your hand.
When a Joker is played together with a 7, the Joker is not counted as a 7 when passing cards.

260314.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n８を含むカードを出すと 場が流れま:
<pipipi_off><speed=0>
If you play an 8, the board clears. If you
play an 8 as your final card while Foul Play
is active, you automatically lose.

260315.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n９を含むカードを出すと 順番が\n:
<pipipi_off><speed=0>If you play a 9, the current turn order will
reverse. If another 9 Reverse occurs, the
turn order returns to normal.

260316.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\n１０を出した枚数を 上限として\n:
You may discard a number of cards from your hand, up to the number of 10 cards played.
You may also pass without discarding any cards.
When a Joker is played together with a 10, the Joker is not counted as a 10 when discarding cards.

260317.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\nＪを含むカードを出すと 場が流れる:
If you play a Jack, card strength will be reversed until the board clears.
If Foul Play is in effect, and 11 Back is currently active, playing a 3 will cause you to automatically lose.

260318.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\nＱを出した枚数を 上限として\n数:
You may choose numbers up to the number of Queens played, and all players discard the chosen numbers from their hands.
You may also choose not to discard any cards.
When a Joker is played together with a Queen, the Joker is not counted as a Queen when discarding cards.
If you play a Queen as your final card, you cannot select any numbers.

260320.<pipipi_off><speed=0>\nジョーカーが 場に出ると\n集まっ:

281060.「もうひとつ このコースには\n チャージブースト機能を 持っている人向けに\n:
There's one more thing to remember about the race for those who have the charge boost. It's called "Full Charge".
If you touch one while your charge meter is still filling, it will immediately fill up to the maximum.
Also, if you touch one while boosting, your charge meter will immediately fill back up to maximum once you finish boosting.
However, Full Charge won't do anything if your charge meter is already full when touching it.
The trick is to Full Charge when your meter is filling or you are boosting. This is super important.

284977.「この塔は挑戦するたびに カタチを変えます。\n 上に登るには 階段を探してくだ:
This tower changes shape with each challenge

you can go as high as the 70th floor.
<bw_break>

284978.「塔の探索は ひとりきりです。死んでしまうと\n 休息の間で 復活しますが 所持:
Exploring the entire tower will take some time. If you die, you'll revive here in the Rest Area. Be warned, however, as this will
cause you to lose half of your Gold.

284979.「塔の中では みな『魔闘士』になります。\n レベルアップや 武器の錬金効果によ:
Here in the tower, everyone becomes a "Magic

or from alchemy effects of weapons.
<bw_break>

284980.「ピピ それと 装備品を手に入れたら\n 改造屋ミニタンに 会いにいくといいです:

how you can enhance it.
<bw_break>

284981.「また 探索をすすめて 実績を達成すると\n 記録係マータから 報酬として\n:

Chips from Marta, the archivist.
<bw_break>

284982.「金と虹のフェザーチップは 旅立ちの間にいる\n 札強化屋ラベローに 渡すと 不:

<bw_break>

284983.「ピピ 最後に 塔の中には なぞが存在します。\n なぞは階ごとに ひとつあって:

mystery to solve. You'll be rewarded with
special items for solving them.
<bw_break>

284984.「だいじなものの 魔塔手帳の中に \n なぞ解きメモとして まとめておきました。:
I've compiled my notes for these mysteries

please feel free to refer to them.
<bw_break>

284985.「さて 塔について 教えて差し上げられるのは\n 以上です。もう一度 聞きたくな:
Well, that's everything that I can tell you

with any other questions you may have.
<bw_break>

286388.「この庭には 『女神の木』の苗が\n 全部で１０本 植えられています。\n<br:
In this garden, there are ten seedlings of a tree called the "Goddess Tree".
The Goddess Tree is said to give power to those who grow it. That power depends on which tree is grown.
For example, growing the Strong Tree increases your Strength, and growing the Hardy Tree increases your Resilience.

286389.「これまでの研究によって\n 女神の木を育てるには パニガルムで手に入る\n 『:
Based on my research, I've concluded that in order for the Goddess Tree to grow, I need "Geneseeds" that come from Panigalm.
If you bring me any, I'll give them to the Goddess Tree to grow. So bring me as many as you can!

286390.「それと 女神の木を育てるときの 注意点です。\n 女神の木へ 成長に必要な素材:
A few things to keep in mind about the Goddess Tree. Once given materials to grow, it will take some time for it to finish.
If you talk to me, I can give you an estimate of when it will finish growing. Let's make sure to check it often.

286391.「複数の女神の木が 全体的に成長していくと\n 研究用の庭 それ自体のランクが上:
As the number of multiple Goddess Trees grow overall, the research garden's rank itself increases. I call this its "Garden Rank".
It seems as the Garden Rank increases, the soil becomes more fertile, allowing trees that hit their limit to grow even further.
In other words, it's a good idea to try to grow all of your Goddess Trees in a balanced manner!

286392.「ふう……。僕からの説明は こんな感じですね。\n 一緒に 女神の木を 育ててい:
Phew... and that's all there is to it. Let's
grow the Goddess Trees together!
<bw_break>

286652.「パニガルムは さまざまな種類の部屋が\n つながった形状をしている。\n<br:
Panigalm is a series of interconnected rooms of differing types.
There are two doors in each direction, but you can only open one in each room.
Before heading deeper inside, it's a good idea to plan out the connections between the rooms.

286653.「進んでいくと 『パニガログ』というものを\n 手にすることが あると思う。\n:
As you progress, you'll most likely come into the possession of something called a Panigalog.
A Panigalog is just a storage medium of information of an item, but on its own it doesn't have any value.
Any Panigalogs you collect will be stored in your Stock during your exploration.
Once you've completed an exploration, you can decrypt any Panigalogs you have and receive the contents inside.
You're more than welcome to take any items you receive. I want to know what's inside of them.

286654.「パニガルムでは ある石碑が出現する。\n 石碑は 我々を支援対象と 認識してい:
In Panigalm, you may come across a special monument. It seems that it recognizes that we wish to help, and grants beneficial powers.
These powers are called "Origin Blessings". If you see one, make sure to use it.
However, when leaving Panigalm, these blessings will mysteriously vanish.

286655.「ああ そうだ。\n いちばん大事なことを 伝えていなかった。\n<br>\n「:
Ah, right. I still have one last important thing to tell you.
In the deepest chamber of Panigalm lies an extremely powerful enemy. Be sure to prepare yourself.
Don't worry, I will assist you by providing you with some helpful items.
Well, that's all I have to say. I'm expecting good things from you.

learn new skills.
<bw_break>

<bw_break>

<bw_break>

<bw_break>

tell you more.

288296.「それと 改造には 素材やゴールドが必要だよ。\n ほしい素材があれば 『ほしい:

Wish List in the Tower Tome.

288297.「……どうやら さっき チャコロットから\n 錬金用の素材を もらったみたいね。:

what effects you can get?
<bw_break>

289656.<pipipi_shigh>「この記念碑から流れる 炎を導き\n 北の庭園にある:
Direct the flames from this monument to the mural of the Heavenshaker in the northern garden with the correct power level.
The initial power level is "5". You can determine where the flame will flow by looking at each branching point.
The power level will be increased or decreased depending on the flame's color while in the garden.

289657.<pipipi_shigh>「色つきの炎は 増減を示す印が 表示されており\n:

289817.「真夜中プリズランでは 追跡チームと逃走チーム\n どちらにも 専用の見た目に扮:
At Midnight Jailrun, we're having both the chase and getaway teams dress up in their own special look and play chase. This time, here
at Wind Town Azlan, we have prepared costumes for A Fateful Confrontation cat and mouse, respectively. They are my creations! But
whichever team you choose to play with, I'll be the one to decide who gets to play.

289818.「追跡チームは 制限時間内に\n 逃走チームの５人 全員を\n 捕まえることがで:
If the Tracker Team can catch all five members
of the Escape Team before time runs out, they
win.
<bw_break>

289819.「捕まえ方は カンタン。\n 相手に近づいて <convenience>を押すと:
So how do you catch them, exactly? It's easy! You can throw a hand forward by pressing !
However, you have a limited amount of hands you can use. Once they run out, you'll have to wait a bit for them to recover.
The tracking team can use a special dash by pressing . Use it sparingly, as you can't use it in quick succession.

289820.「逃走チームは 制限時間まで\n ひとりでも逃げのびたら 勝ちよ。\n<br>\:
The Escapees have until the time limit to escape. If even just one person remains uncaught, they win.
The Escapees have a special skill they can use with . It'll turn you invisible, but you can only use it every so often.

289821.「画面が黄色くなったら 追跡チームが\n 近づいてきている サイン。赤くなったら:
When the screen turns yellow, a Tracker
is getting close. When it's red, they're
REALLY close. Get away, quickly!
<bw_break>

289822.「追跡チームに 捕まった場合は\n プリズンエリアに 閉じ込められてしまうわ。\:
If a Tracker catches you, you'll be
locked inside the Prison Area.
<bw_break>

289823.「でも 安心して。プリズンロックに\n アタックすることで 捕まった仲間を\n:
But don't worry! By attacking the Prison Lock, you can save your allies who have been captured.
Attacking it is easy. Just go up to the Prison Lock and press .

289824.「ただし プリズンロックは 頑丈で\n ５回 アタックしないと\n 破壊すること:
However, the Prison Lock is really tough, so it'll take five attacks to destroy it.
On the fifth attack, the lock breaks and all of your captured allies will be rescued.

289825.「最後に アイテムについて 説明するわね。\n 真夜中プリズランには 遊びを盛り:
Lastly, let's talk about Items, which are the
various items that make Midnight Jailrun so
much fun.
<bw_break>

289826.「プリズンキーは 逃走チームが触れた瞬間に\n プリズンロックの ロックを １つ:
The Prison Key can destroy a lock on the Prison Lock the moment it is touched by the escape team! The Prison Key can be erased when
the pursuit team touches it. Both teams should take it as soon as they find it.

289827.「ほかにも キャッチハンドや\n お助けボックス ワープウィングなどの\n アイ:
There are other items, such as Catch Hands, Help Boxes, Warp Wings, and more.
Items mostly will automatically use themselves when picked up, but Helper Boxes and Insight must be used by holding down .
If you want to know more about the other items, I can explain them to you later. Just ask.

289828.「プリズランの手引きは 以上よ。\n 今すぐ 遊びたくて\n ウズウズしてきたん:
And that's all for how to play. I bet you're just itching to play now, aren't you?
Come on! Look deep inside and awaken those instincts!

290325.<pipipi_shigh>「……システム起動完了。\n これより 原初の炎の:
...System startup completed. I will now explain the process for unsealing the Origin Flame.
Direct the flames from this monument to the mural of the Heavenshaker in the northern garden with the correct power level.
The initial power level is "5". You can determine where the flame will flow by looking at each branching point.
The power level will be increased or decreased depending on the flame's color while in the garden.

290326.<pipipi_shigh>「色つきの炎は 増減を示す印が 表示されており\n:
<pipipi_shigh>Colored flames have a number of marks to
determine their change in power level. Red
flames increase while blue flames decrease.
<bw_break>

290327.<pipipi_shigh>「最終的に 震天王の壁画で\n 火力が ちょうど『１:
Lastly, if you can reach a power level of 10 by the time you reach the mural, you will release the seal.
You can reset the flow of flames at this monument if needed.
Explanation has finished. Reached end of voice guidance.

300444.「ヴァリーブートキャンプでは こちらで用意した\n 修練用のモンスターに できる:
Here at Valley Boot Camp, the goal is to try to deal as much damage to a monster we've prepared for the highest score!
Even the Great Demon King can't destroy these monsters, so don't be afraid to go all out!
The boot camp can either be challenged alone or with a group of other adventurers.
However, damage caused by other adventurers or inflicted ailments won't count towards your score.
Gotta win with your own power!

300445.「戦闘が始まると 途中でアイテムが出現する。\n このアイテムは 拾った本人にだ:
When the battle begins, items will soon appear. Whoever picks them up will get a nice boost, but only they will get it.
But, the items won't disappear if someone else gets to them first! Don't hesitate to pick 'em up too!
There are several different types of items, so be sure to try 'em all out.

300446.「戦闘終了の ３０秒前になると\n ボーナスタイムに突入する！ この間は\n な:
30 seconds before the battle ends, Bonus Time will start! When that happens, all dealt damage will be doubled!
Also when Bonus Time starts, Special skills and Pep will be triggered.
So, when you see Bonus Time, it's time to go all out and deal loads of damage! Get the highest score you can!

300447.「もし 戦闘中に死亡したら 他の冒険者から\n 見えなくなり どんな方法を使った:
If you die in battle, that's it! You're done! You'll be invisible to other adventurers when you're dead.
If you used "Search For Allies" and you die, you will automatically leave the battle.
If you used "Fixed Party" or "Don't Form Alliance", you'll enter spectator mode when you die.
You can't fight while in spectator mode, so sit back and enjoy the show. Maybe you can learn a new thing or two.

300448.「そうそう せっかく 大魔王様が挑戦するんだ。\n オレっちの用意した 難しい実:
Right, right. Since you're the Great Demon King and all, I got some challenges for you. Beat 'em, and you'll be rewarded!
You can use "View Achievements" if you want a closer look.

300449.「最後に 職業についての注意点だ。\n 他の冒険者と 一緒に挑戦する場合は\n:
And finally, about vocations. If you're going in with other adventures, make sure you're all the same vocation.
Try out any vocations you like, but make sure you're all the same one.
For example, if you're a warrior, you'll be matched up with only warriors when choosing "Search for Allies".
Huh? You wanna know about druids and their spirits? Normally it's one per party, but here every druid can summon their own!
Same thing goes for a death master's spirits and pirate cannons. Don't think! Just summon 'em!
Of course if you're going in alone, you don't have to worry 'bout all of that.
To see all the restrictions, choose "Valley Boot Camp Challenge" for more details!

300450.「説明は以上だ。\n もっと くわしい説明が聞きたければ\n 『説明を聞く』から:
That's all. If you need further explanation, go ahead and choose "Explanation".
All right then, Great Demon King! Get out there and show me those skills!

There's one more thing to remember about the race for those who have the charge boost. It's called "Full Charge".
If you touch one while your charge meter is still filling, it will immediately fill up to the maximum.
Also, if you touch one while boosting, your charge meter will immediately fill back up to maximum once you finish boosting.
However, Full Charge won't do anything if your charge meter is already full when touching it.
The trick is to Full Charge when your meter is filling or you are boosting. This is super important.

During Midnight Jailrun, both the Trackers and Escapees will be dressed in special costumes and playing a game of chase.
This time around, I've prepared fox and rabbit outfits for each team, to match the vibe of the Langao Mountains, just outside this
village. They're my masterpiece!

332226.「追跡チームは 制限時間内に\n 逃走チームの５人 全員を\n 捕まえることがで:
If the Trackers can catch all five members
of the Escapees before time runs out, they
win.
<bw_break>

332227.「捕まえ方は カンタン。\n 相手に近づいて <convenience>を押すと:
So how do you catch them, exactly? It's easy! You can throw a hand forward by pressing !
However, you have a limited amount of hands you can use. Once they run out, you'll have to wait a bit for them to recover.
The Trackers can use a special dash by pressing . Use it sparingly, as you can't use it in quick succession.

332228.「逃走チームは 制限時間まで\n ひとりでも逃げのびたら 勝ちよ。\n<br>\:
The Escapees have until the time limit to escape. If even just one person remains uncaught, they win.
The Escapees have a special skill they can use with . It'll turn you invisible, but you can only use it every so often.

332229.「画面が黄色くなったら 追跡チームが\n 近づいてきている サイン。赤くなったら:
When the screen turns yellow, a Tracker
is getting close. When it's red, they're
REALLY close. Get away, quickly!
<bw_break>

332230.「追跡チームに 捕まった場合は\n プリズンエリアに 閉じ込められてしまうわ。\:
If a Tracker catches you, you'll be
locked inside the Prison Area.
<bw_break>

332231.「でも 安心して。プリズンロックに\n アタックすることで 捕まった仲間を\n:
But don't worry! By attacking the Prison Lock, you can save your allies who have been captured.
Attacking it is easy. Just go up to the Prison Lock and press .

332232.「ただし プリズンロックは 頑丈で\n ５回 アタックして ロックを解除しないと:
However, the Prison Lock is really strong, and will only unlock after being attacked 5 times.
After the fifth attack, all companions in the Prison Area will be freed.

332233.「最後に アイテムについて 説明するわね。\n 真夜中プリズランには 遊びを盛り:
Lastly, let's talk about Items, which are the
various items that make Midnight Jailrun so
much fun.
<bw_break>

332234.「プリズンキーは 逃走チームが触れた瞬間に\n プリズンロックの ロックを １つ:
Prison Keys can unlock one Prison Lock whenever an Escapee picks one up!
However, please remember that Prison Keys cannot open the final lock. It will need to be attacked.
If a Tracker picks up a key, it disappears. Both teams should try picking them up as soon as they see them.

332235.「ほかにも キャッチハンドや\n お助けボックス ワープウィングなどの\n アイ:
There are other items, such as Catch Hands, Help Boxes, Warp Wings, and more.
Items mostly will automatically use themselves when picked up, but Helper Boxes and Insight must be used by holding down .
If you want to know more about the other items, I can explain them to you later. Just ask.

332236.「プリズランの手引きは 以上よ。\n 今すぐ 遊びたくて\n ウズウズしてきたん:
And that's all for how to play. I bet you're just itching to play now, aren't you?
Come on! Look deep inside and awaken those instincts!
